verses.verse: וְאֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> unto Moses אָמַ֜ר <WH559> And he said עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> Come up אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וְאַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> thou and Aaron נָדָ֣ב <WH5070> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <WH30> and Abihu וְשִׁבְעִ֖ים <WH7657> and seventy מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <WH7812> and worship מֵרָחֹֽק׃ <WH7350> ye afar off

וְנִגַּ֨שׁ <WH5066> alone shall come near מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> And Moses לְבַדּוֹ֙ <WH905> alone אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> like לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִגָּ֑שׁוּ <WH5066> but they shall not come nigh וְהָעָ֕ם <WH5971> neither shall the people לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יַעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> go up עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses וַיְסַפֵּ֤ר <WH5608> and told לָעָם֙ <WH5971> the people אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> all the words יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <WH4941> and all the judgments וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> and all the people ק֤וֹל <WH6963> voice אֶחָד֙ <WH259> with one וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַדְּבָרִ֛ים <WH1697> All the words אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> will we do

וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <WH3789> wrote מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> all the words יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> and rose up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> and builded מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> an altar תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> the foot הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> under the hill וּשְׁתֵּ֤ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> ten מַצֵּבָ֔ה <WH4676> and twelve pillars לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> And he sent אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַעֲרֵי֙ <WH5288> young men בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּֽעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> which offered עֹלֹ֑ת <WH5930> burnt offerings וַֽיִּזְבְּח֞וּ <WH2076> and sacrificed זְבָחִ֧ים <WH2077> offerings שְׁלָמִ֛ים <WH8002> peace לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD פָּרִֽים׃ <WH6499> of oxen

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> half הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> of the blood וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <WH7760> and put בָּאַגָּנֹ֑ת <WH101> [it] in basons וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> and half הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> of the blood זָרַ֖ק <WH2236> he sprinkled עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> on the altar

וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> And he took סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> the book הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> and read בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> in the audience הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and they said כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> All אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> All that the LORD נַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> will we do וְנִשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> and be obedient

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> the blood וַיִּזְרֹ֖ק <WH2236> and sprinkled עַל־ <WH5921> accordance הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> [it] on the people וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold דַֽם־ <WH1818> Behold the blood הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which כָּרַ֤ת <WH3772> hath made יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> in עַ֥ל <WH5921> accordance כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> with you concerning all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> Then went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> and Aaron נָדָב֙ <WH5070> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <WH30> and Abihu וְשִׁבְעִ֖ים <WH7657> and seventy מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּרְא֕וּ <WH7200> And they saw אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְתַ֣חַת <WH8478> and under רַגְלָ֗יו <WH7272> and [there was] under his feet כְּמַעֲשֵׂה֙ <WH4639> work לִבְנַ֣ת <WH3840> as it were a paved הַסַּפִּ֔יר <WH5601> of a sapphire stone וּכְעֶ֥צֶם <WH6106> and as it were the body הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven לָטֹֽהַר׃ <WH2892> in [his] clearness

וְאֶל־ <WH413> against אֲצִילֵי֙ <WH678> And upon the nobles בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שָׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> he laid יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> not his hand וַֽיֶּחֱזוּ֙ <WH2372> also they saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <WH398> and did eat וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <WH8354> and drink ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses עֲלֵ֥ה <WH5927> Come up אֵלַ֛י <WH413> to הָהָ֖רָה <WH2022> to me into the mount וֶהְיֵה־ <WH1961> and remain שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וְאֶתְּנָ֨ה <WH5414> and be there and I will give לְךָ֜ אֶת־ <WH853> לֻחֹ֣ת <WH3871> thee tables הָאֶ֗בֶן <WH68> of stone וְהַתּוֹרָה֙ <WH8451> and a law וְהַמִּצְוָ֔ה <WH4687> and commandments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כָּתַ֖בְתִּי <WH3789> which I have written לְהוֹרֹתָֽם׃ <WH3384> that thou mayest teach

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> rose up מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> Joshua מְשָׁרְת֑וֹ <WH8334> and his minister וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> and Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֥ר <WH2022> into the mount הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to הַזְּקֵנִ֤ים <WH2205> unto the elders אָמַר֙ <WH559> And he said שְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> Tarry לָ֣נוּ בָזֶ֔ה <WH2088> ye here עַ֥ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after נָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> for us until we come again אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> to you וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> unto you and behold Aaron וְחוּר֙ <WH2354> and Hur עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> you מִי־ <WH4310> [are] with you if any בַ֥עַל <WH1167> to do דְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> have any matters יִגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> let him come אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about
וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> into the mount וַיְכַ֥ס <WH3680> covered הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> and a cloud אֶת־ <WH853> הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> the mount

וַיִּשְׁכֹּ֤ן <WH7931> abode כְּבוֹד־ <WH3519> And the glory יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> on הַ֣ר <WH2022> upon mount סִינַ֔י <WH5514> Sinai וַיְכַסֵּ֥הוּ <WH3680> covered הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> and the cloud שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> it six יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וַיִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> he called אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> unto Moses בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> and the seventh מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הֶעָנָֽן׃ <WH6051> of the cloud

וּמַרְאֵה֙ <WH4758> And the sight כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> of the glory יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> fire אֹכֶ֖לֶת <WH398> [was] like devouring בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> on the top הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> of the mount לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the eyes בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> went מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> into the midst הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> of the cloud וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> and gat him up אֶל־ <WH413> to הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> into the mount וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> and Moses בָּהָ֔ר <WH2022> was in the mount אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> and forty לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> nights פ
